DOC.detailed_description: Caregiver : If choose take part study , ask complete 3 study visit period 20 week ( first visit , follow 2 visit , usually 3-8 week apart ) . During first third visit , ask take part interview include question experience caregiver patient cancer . The interview last 30-45 minute tape record . The text interview copy tape write format . You also ask complete brief survey physical psychological health , reaction caregiver , beliefs symptom control . It take 30-45 minute complete survey , time . Each study visit take 60-90 minute . If come clinic , train research study staff contact telephone home visit ( permission ) complete survey interview . After last 3 study visit , participation end study . This investigational study .
